name: Pixelwise Evaluation Plugin
title: Pixelwise Evaluation Plugin
description: Plugin to generate evaluation metrics for pixel-wise comparison of ground truth and predicted images.
author: Vishakha Goyal (vishakha.goyal@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: GTDir
inputs.description: Ground truth input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: PredDir
inputs.description: Predicted input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: individualStats
inputs.description: Boolean to create separate result file per image. Default is false.

inputs.name: totalStats
inputs.description: Boolean to calculate overall statistics across all images. Default is false.

ui.title: Ground Truth Images
ui.description: Ground truth input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: Predicted Images
ui.description: Predicted input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: Individual statistics
ui.description: Boolean to create separate result file per image. Default is false.

ui.title: Total statistics
ui.description: Boolean to calculate overall statistics across all images. Default is false.
